intro: Maianthemum nanchuanense, commonly known as the Nanchuan false lily, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Melanthiaceae and is characterized by its grass-like foliage and small, white or greenish flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forest understories. It has rhizomatous growth, allowing it to spread and form dense colonies. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its native habitat.
